website_summaries.verdict: Newer type of game, but it can give you a good workout while having lots of fun in the backyard or at the beach.
pros: Set includes all of the parts you'll need to begin playing immediately, including instructions
All of the pieces fit in a drawstring bag
The legs on the net will fold up, so you can take it anywhere easily
Game can be played recreationally or competitively
cons: More expensive than some other backyard games
Won't stand up well to rough treatment

website_summaries.verdict: The cheapest Spikeball set is also the best for beginners.
pros: Comes with everything needed to play — one set, one standard ball, and one drawstring bag
Kit is lightweight and easy to carry
cons: The ball may deflate easily, and a pump is not included
Legs and rim are slightly fragile
Can be difficult to get balls to bounce

customer_reviews.title: Virtually no assembly required and FUN! The kids played it for more than an ...
customer_reviews.text: My 15-year-old and his friends were waiting by the door for this item to be delivered. The UPS man handed it over and they were playing it within five minutes. Virtually no assembly required and FUN! The kids played it for more than an hour -- laughing and screaming. It's been a great addition to our non-screen activities offerings!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Boone

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the off brand!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I LOVE this game. SO.MUCH.FUN!!! We played all week at a family reunion on one that was an off brand and the bounce was definitely not as good. So it does change the game a bit if you don't have a good quality one. If you are going to be too serious about this game or play it much at all, it's not worth getting a knock off version! This is definitely better.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: My son had purchased this and because our family loves it so much I purchased a second set. We even brought both sets to a family reunion in California this week. They will both fit into a roller carry on bag. We have family members age 5 up to 59 playing this game. It's easily portable and sets up quickly. Only suggestion is to have a pump for the balls when they get soft. You want to keep them firm for best performance. Airplane ride will cause them to lose a little pressure. It's not only fun and easy to play but you do get your heart pumping.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money 😟
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. We got this game and were super excited to play it at the beach. The ball lasted less then 30 minutes and the seal that made it hold air disappeared. Unfortunate an expensive game cannot hold up for even one game.
customer_reviews.author: lorrie spends $

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple package. A bit cumbersome to setup correctly. It takes some practice to get the net stretched for the right bounce. A lot of fun for the whole family once it's put together. It's also pricey! $30.00 would be a fair price for this.
customer_reviews.author: Yogibear

customer_reviews.title: Well made and great warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Just when you thought you've played every lawn game there is a new game is invented that turns into the center of family fun in the backyard and at the parks. Very fun family game. Well done! Well made and great warranty. Family loves playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: Esquire

customer_reviews.title: Better deal in stores!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item when my son asked me for it. About a month later I looked at it online and realized that most sets come with 3 balls. I asked my son about it and he said yes you should have 3 balls to play. It's easier. So now I'm stuck with this set that has 1 ball and would need to purchase more for another $15. If I would've just purchased it at Target I would have 3 balls and $15 extra dollars. Definitely not a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Live to shop

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Kids have had a blast playing this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Kids have had a blast playing this on the beach during vacation. As described, easy and quick set-up. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Trying to reach customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to find contact info for company but I can’t. My kids received this for Christmas but just took it out this week, because - winter in MN! They played it twice and part of the netting is already thin and unraveling. It’s about to break at any minute. They love playing it and I wish I could give 5 stars. How can I get a free replacement net (or two) so they can continue to play?
customer_reviews.author: AK2017

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my 10 year old's birthday and he loved it! All my kids and their friends love ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old's birthday and he loved it! All my kids and their friends love playing it. I can see this being the game we bring to the beach and to tailgates as well as my kids' hockey games for the team to play.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Catana

customer_reviews.title: 12 year olds love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister to have during quarantine. They LOVE it! Super fast shipping, clean packaging, and easy to set up instructions. I didn't have to help them do a single thing. I can see why this is so popular. I do wish you didn't have to pay so much extra to get the other balls in the kit but I can where the sell up is. Overall every home should have this game!
customer_reviews.author: erin helton

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than toting around a volleyball net. ...
customer_reviews.text: So much easier than toting around a volleyball net. My family loves this game! Kids are ages 11, 15 and 17. It's so addictive. We've been playing it inside and outside. Can't wait to bring it along to the beach and on camping trips this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: THIS GAME and company are NEXT level. I will admit I was not sure when I bought this if I should’ve gone with a cheaper knock off version. The customer service is TOP notch. My new rescue puppy popped both of my new electric charged balls and they sent me replacements within 7 days! They did not have to do that, I was willing to pay but they did not offer replacements of the same on their website for purchase. My family and I get together to play spikeball day and night almost every weekend this summer, if you love yard games and volleyball buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I would like to return this item. I am disappointed with this product. It is not as it was advertised. The net is very loose, there is no bouncing possible to make. The game could fit only for toddlers. I bought it for my teenagers and they got bored within 5 min, since the ball never jumped higher then 12 inch over the net. Please, provide me with the instructions how to return it. Everything is in the same good condition as it was arrived. I easily assembled it back in the box. Sorry, it is not fun at all.
customer_reviews.author: New to Dance

customer_reviews.title: A Beach Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is great for Beach Days! Perfect for the Park as well. Great quality, super sturdy and made well. Wish the bag was larger to kind of fit the whole hoop, because you have to take it apart each time to put it back in the bag but then it is great for storing because it takes up less space. Everyone gets in on the action when you bring this game with you. Son took it to College
customer_reviews.author: Mady

customer_reviews.title: Great for an indoor cold weather activity.
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for our active boys during the cold winter days. Seems pretty sturdy for 8-13 year old players. Took a little longer to put together than anticipated but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MillerMama

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun For All Ages
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game! A little tricky to get the net as tight as it needs to be for good bounce BUT don’t let that deter you from purchasing. It’s an easy and quick fix. My 8 year old absolutely loves this and we revised the rules to allow for two person play rather than teams. It’s also something that you can do indoors on a rainy/boring day if you have a large open space! Lots of fun! Glad we purchased!
customer_reviews.author: hartr0

customer_reviews.title: Decent game, filthy box
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson. It arrived on time and it seemed all pieces were there BUT, the box was awful!! Both ends were open. There were grease marks on the bottom and the entire box was very dirty. In this world of covid 19, I didn't even want to touch it. Just set it outside for a couple days. There was no no reason to deliver such a filthy box. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma J

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: My grands (10, 12, 14) play this game for hours at a time, without bickering. Once they understood the (few) rules they decided to follow a couple of them and ignore the rest. It's a very active game and encourages them to cooperate and focus. Their friends love it too. It works fine on the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Ningu

customer_reviews.title: It is great for tailgating and summer parties
customer_reviews.text: I love this game so much it is an amazing game for kids as it isn’t absolutely necessary for them to follow every single rule you can kinda make up your own game but still have the option to stick to the true rules. It is great for tailgating and summer parties
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bacon

customer_reviews.title: expected more for the price
customer_reviews.text: flimsy net and tiny ball. I guess I just expected more for the price. I gave it 2 stars because it didn't break the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Smith

customer_reviews.title: spikeball for christmas
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew for Christmas--I am very disappointed that there is not a video or better directions on how to play this game---also box was pretty wrecked when it got here. Suggest to put it in a shipping box since the only directions are on the outside of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: If you have kids or are a kid at heart yourself... you HAVE to get spikeball. I have 4 boys (3 of them teenagers), my house is always full between my boys and their friends (it’s the hangout house). I love providing fun things for them to do (creating memories is priceless).
customer_reviews.author: TheGreatJC

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING game (especially in quarantine)
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nieces (13, 14, 17) and taught them to play in 5 minutes and they love it. They're stuck in their small house and yard with "nothing to do" right now, and this was an awesome gift idea. Gets the off the couch and having a ittle outside fun. Easy to set up. Convenient bag. Just remember to make the net tight when you set it up!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought for a family reunion and so far so good!! Went together easy and appears to bounce the way it needs to! I did think it came with a small hand pump for the ball and it didnt so that might have just been on me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kastelic

customer_reviews.title: GRANDSON LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: When he opened this present on Christmas he was delighted- he'd played it in gym at school and was happy to have one for home. I haven't tried it but am just expressing his reaction. It's pricey for what you get but what the heck, grandkids are worth it and then some!
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: It's also very easy to learn which I think makes it great for ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is incredibly addicting and convenient! We had to buy it after trying out our friends' set. It's also very easy to learn which I think makes it great for just about anybody looking for an outdoor activity as the weather gets warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Fun game! My son was really surprised by it
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! My son was really surprised by it. He sent a message to his friends and many replied that it was the best game ever. They were really excited that he had gotten one for Christmas. My son thinks it will be a blast to play on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Net came with a small tear
customer_reviews.text: Hi amazing product, i just got it today but i noticed a small tear right in the middle of the net. I rated this product a 3 and not a 4 or 5 because of the defect that it came with, i was wondering if i could get the part shipped to me and then I’ll change the rating of my review.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gutt

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: bought for kids to use at beach. easy to carry, put together and to play (they already knew the game) We keep it assembled and hang for future use
customer_reviews.author: Kasara

customer_reviews.title: purchase regret
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge disappointment. Difficult to set up, ball had ink that rubbed off on hands and clothing, and ball deflated before we could even use it once. Sadly past return window. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DamonW

customer_reviews.title: Fun at the lake or beach!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun and active game for the lake or beach so you can cool off when you’re done playing. Teenagers and adults can figure it out quickly and seem to enjoy it. Need 4 people to play.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Lotza fun!
customer_reviews.text: This game arrived quickly and was packaged well. It is a hit with all ages in our family. The kids take this with them to play with friends often. Has taken a beating and has withstood it. This was the best price anywhere! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JennJo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap and flimsy. Waste of money I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: megan fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Great spikeball set
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, and my daughter loves it. It's easy to put together and take apart, but doesn't come apart on its own. Fun game!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout game.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and my son-in-law and my Granddaughter love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlely White

customer_reviews.title: This game is awesome! Very high energy
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome! Very high energy, but my family had found that everyone can play from 8 - 70 years old (she's active) the net will probably need to be replaced in a year or so, but I'm extremely happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: This game is great to play in the backyard or beach. Took a little bit of time to learn how to play. The kids 12 and 14 were able to easily put it together. The ball is pretty cheap, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Made of very light material, easily broken
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to get this game however the 1st day we used it one of the pieces broke and made it not able to take apart and store.
customer_reviews.author: Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Product fine - didn’t arrive in time.
customer_reviews.text: The spike ball is fine, but didn’t arrive when it was supposed to & it was a gift. Since it didn’t arrive in time, I had to go purchase another gift - now I’m stuck with something I don’t need. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: Teen boys love playing Spikeball
customer_reviews.text: My teen boys, and their friends really enjoy playing spikeball. It's well made and keeps them entertained. I love the fact that it's portable so we bring it to our summer place to enjoy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shinnick

customer_reviews.title: The most fun new game I have found in years
customer_reviews.text: The most fun new game I have found in years. I could play for hours. Great for the beach or any outdoor space, or indoor if you have enough room for everyone to run around. A good way to get active, have fun and get a little exercise!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Summers

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: We played spikeball all summer long at home, the beach and the mountains. Easy to transport for fun and games anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gard

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my physical education department. Students enjoyed implementing the lesson plans that they had to write on the sport of Spikeball. Will order more sets as able.
customer_reviews.author: jlcminn

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! It is the one activity everyone in my ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! It is the one activity everyone in my family enjoys. With 10 people, it is rare that we all agree on a game.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany J. Wyse

customer_reviews.title: best present for a teenage boy ever
customer_reviews.text: best present for a teenage boy ever! just takes a minute to understand the serving rules, etc... think of it as round volleyball. great co-ed fun, like at a party or whatever. we love it!
customer_reviews.author: nwhiting

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The ball for the set came with a hole, also the set was missing the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Got 1 ball but Paid for same price as others with 3
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced here you get only 1 ball and I believe the game comes standard with 3 balls we got totally duped in this for same price it sells elsewhere and got less.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer Game
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun with friends and easy to learn and pick up...challenging enough to want to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete set
customer_reviews.text: I only received one ball. I have had 2 other family members buy this elsewhere and it came with 4 balls each. Other then being short 3 spike balls, I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melani Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set-up, fun to play, buy one!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the set for my teenage daughter's birthday party and the kids had a blast playing it. We also played it as a family on Easter. Easy to learn and fun to play. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SacSing

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game is soo fun. Took a while to get used to, but once you do it’s great. I bought it for the beach and we’ve played it nonstop. I will say, it’s definitely not a game for the uncoordinated.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Gill

customer_reviews.title: cross train for lacrosse
customer_reviews.text: Kids played this at lacrosse camp- loved it! Now if the foot of snow we just got would melt so they can play!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Spikeball
customer_reviews.text: It's super fun! Can be played inside and outside. It's good for a variety of ages. BEST of all, it's so easy to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harris

customer_reviews.title: Spike ball is fun - and growing in popularity.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried cheap nock-off brands. Don't do it - they brake. Just get the original. It's fun, and easy to set up. Great for lawn games.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Getting the kids off of electronics...yes! Folds down and easy to store. Built well for rough play.
customer_reviews.author: TAMARA LUDINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Great beach/lawn game
customer_reviews.text: Great game and can get really competitive after practice. It is a bit difficult to learn for some relatively unathletic people.
customer_reviews.author: Cian Amor

customer_reviews.title: but the name brand Spikeball set really does work better!
customer_reviews.text: I bought some cheap knockoff at Academy first, but the name brand Spikeball set really does work better!
customer_reviews.author: switzertex

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The game arrived with only 4 pieces of the ring enclosed, making it impossible to assemble and play.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: luv it!!!
customer_reviews.text: spike ball is a super fun yard game for 4!!!!! had never played it until I bot this one......and it is gr8 quality!! after I played on this one, I played on someone else's cheap quality one, and it hus dont perform as well as this one does!
customer_reviews.author: Jadon Hursh

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the whole family. My kids love to play Spikeball and challenge their friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose Net
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t as sturdy as I’d hope, and the net is really loose. We’ve tried to tighten it, but without much luck. Otherwise, it’s easy to assemble and play.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cooksey

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages.  Great for get togethers.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun! Got 5 to give as gifts ages ranged from 13-21 yr olds. Big hit will all! Lots of fun to play at get togethers. Both guys & girls enjoy playing. Fair warning... if you play couples teams this game really brings out your competitive nature!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. It is easy to play, set up and store. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: AMS48

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, just don't get to play very often. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best game I have ever played. HOURS of fun and easy to assemble/dissemble. Incredible and fun workout!
customer_reviews.author: CassieB

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game... I would not classify it as “sturdy” by any means but is a GREAT game
customer_reviews.author: C. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Net tightness?
customer_reviews.text: Have to my niece for her 15th bday. Only had a chance to play once so far. Seems pretty tricky. Not totally sure we had the net tight enough. Kept trying to make it tighter as we played so the ball would bounce better. We will certainly need practice! Hopefully we'll get better.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased Spike ball for my son's high school graduation party. He put it all together by himself and he and his friends had a blast playing it! Highly recommend :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lula Lars

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to play on the beach. My whole family enjoyed it. Harder than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Order one with two balls
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game easy to do but they should send two balls
customer_reviews.author: lisa Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to play! It is sturdy and easy to assemble and play.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Fun for HOURS
customer_reviews.text: What do you get for the active dad who has everything? Spikeball!! He LOVED it and our family has played outside for hours!! Brings people together for a fun time!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Lantz

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: ValeryR

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. From age 5 to age 66....we are having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L.

customer_reviews.title: Hours and hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: The family has been really enjoying this set at home, after first experiencing it at a friend's house. Hours and hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: GailM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and fun for multiple players at once
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son and his friends had fun playing at his party.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Hill

customer_reviews.title: Spoiler Alert!
customer_reviews.text: The game is fun- but purchasers may want to know that this is shipped in a fully branded box- so the recipients will know ASAP. Don't ship this direct if you want to give a surprise. We learned this the hard way. Son was super excited to know his Christmas gift weeks before the holiday :(
customer_reviews.author: Angie S

customer_reviews.title: Spikeball is so much fun. This set is great
customer_reviews.text: Spikeball is so much fun. This set is great. If you don't know what it is check out USA Spikeball. Videos of game play and rules there.
customer_reviews.author: Bucsman32

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: A fun and easy game that can be enjoyed by anyone. Great for the beach and parties.
customer_reviews.author: theActiveGuy.com

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for our grandsons and the love it! They are having a blast playing with it along with their friends. A good game for active kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great game...took some time to get the net adjusted properly
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Spikeball for 4
customer_reviews.text: It's still in the box as you need 4 to play. We will use it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: SKap

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but difficult
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard game! They make it look very easy, but even volleyball players and a hard time mastering it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wilger

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 yr old son for his birthday because he loved playing it at a friends home. He has been playing with it everyday and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey  P

customer_reviews.title: Get your heart going
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun. If you can keep up. Great active game for people of all ages and small enough to take with you to the park or a friends house or just use in your own backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Yoch

customer_reviews.title: So far we like it!
customer_reviews.text: We have just started playing it. Saw a dad and his high school age girls playing it at the beach and it looked like fun. Played it for the first time tonight and I think it is a family hit. We definitely need some practice!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: a favorite for our teen son and friends
customer_reviews.text: great cardio workout playing this game- 4 players a must
customer_reviews.author: Dana Pressnell

customer_reviews.title: Great family activity.
customer_reviews.text: Great activity! Our family has loved playing this game. Our 9-year old son can play with his teenage brothers.
customer_reviews.author: Shaura Miller

customer_reviews.title: Over priced!
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews- really poorly made with plastic frame that twists when the net is attached. Totally not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KM Tran

customer_reviews.title: All parts need to be present
customer_reviews.text: Missing a very important part of the fame. The 5th leg.... please help!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This is so much fun. My son and I play it ever single ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun. My son and I play it ever single day. Easy to play inside, and we look forward to taking it with us on our next beach trip. It's easier to play than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sells

customer_reviews.title: So sorry for my last review
customer_reviews.text: My son had opened it and took the net and ball out. I wrote a review saying it was missing the net when really, my son had removed it :/ Anyhow it works great and we love it. Highly recommend this product for fun at the beach or any outdoor gathering
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Spikeball is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, took about 5 minutes to setup and we were ready to play. It was bought as a gift. My friend and his family love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love it! It was pretty easy to put together. It was exactly what we expected. We have already had hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Brantlee Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction with a neat product
customer_reviews.text: Great transaction with a neat product! Everything was as it should be and it arrived quickly! Our Son is loving his Spikeball game. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: T. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Making even family reunions more fun!
customer_reviews.text: We just took this game to a family reunion and it was a huge hit! So fun, pretty easy to learn, and totally addictive once you get the hang of it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase and so much fun to play
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he absolutely loves playing it with his friends, They all have a blast. Great purchase and investment for the summer.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys love playing this game. Seems sturdy. Taking to beach this summer.

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Thank you shark tank for backing Spike Ball!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Spikeball Game Set - Played Outdoors, Indoors, Lawn, Yard, Beach, Tailgate, Park - Includes 1 Ball, Drawstring Bag, and Rule Book - Game for Boys, Girls, Teens, Adults, Family
feature_bullets: FOUR PLAYER ACTION – Spikeball is a fun, active, and competitive (if you want it to be) 2 on 2 game played with rules kind of like volleyball; Enjoy outdoors, indoors, lawn, yard, beach, gym, tailgate, family get togethers, vacations, virtually anywhere and for any event
FOLDABLE LEGS make the product tougher. Errant dives and falls happen, these legs can take the abuse. Bonus! Easier to store Spikeball in your trunk, closet or garage
ADJUSTABLE NET – Play at the tournament standard or tailor the net tightness to your preference. More bounce for newer players, Less bounce for advanced
CARRYING BAG - Always have something to pack your game in with the included carrying bag!
TONS OF VARIATIONS - Spikeball is typically played two on two, but it can be played in many other variations, like 1 on 1 or 3 on 3!
